entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: Resident Evil Village for Mac
entry.summary:
Price: $39.99 ‚Üí $15.99
DLC pack: $19.99 ‚Üí $9.99
All Access Voucher: $4.99 ‚Üí $1.99
Street Wolf Outfit: $2.99 ‚Üí $2.29
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$39.99 ‚Üí $15.99 Ôºâ

In-App Purchases

  • DLC packÔºö$19.99 ‚Üí $9.99
  • All Access VoucherÔºö$4.99 ‚Üí $1.99
  • Street Wolf OutfitÔºö$2.99 ‚Üí $2.29

Application Description

Experience survival horror like never before in the 8th major installment in the Resident Evil franchise - Resident Evil Village. With detailed graphics, intense first-person action and masterful storytelling, the terror has never felt more realistic. [Warning] Signing out of Apple ID may cause problems with your save data. Please try to refrain from signing out as much as possible until this issue is resolved. ‚ñ†A network connection is required when starting the application. ------------------------------------------------------------ ‚ñ†About the End User License Agreement „ÉªThis End User License Agreement (this ‚ÄúAgreement‚Äù) applies to the user‚Äôs use of this game software program (the ‚ÄúProgram‚Äù). „ÉªTHIS AGREEMENT SHALL COME INTO EFFECT BETWEEN CAPCOM CO., LTD. AND USER(S) UPON INSTALLATION OF THE PROGRAM BY THE USER. „ÉªThose users between the ages of 13 and 18 (or between 13 and the age of legal majority in your country of residence) or a person with limited capacity shall install the Program only after obtaining approval from its parent or legal guardian who agrees to be bound by these provisions of this Agreement. Please confirm the terms above and agree to this Agreement before purchasing the Program. ------------------------------------------------------------ Important Note: The installation process requires that you have at least twice the size of the application in free storage space available. ‚ñ†Save data upload and download functionality via iCloud Drive has been added. ‚ñ†Save data cannot be uploaded and downloaded between MacOS and iOS devices. ‚ñ†Resident Evil Village does not support Universal Purchase. Included Content „ÉªResident Evil Village „ÉªThe Trauma Pack DLC - Samurai Edge - AW Model-01 - Resident Evil 7 Found Footage Filter - Resident Evil 7 Tape Recorder Save Point - Saferoom Music "Go Tell Aunt Rhody" - Mr. Everywhere Weapon Charm - Unlock "Village of Shadows" Difficulty - The Tragedy of Ethan Winters Artwork - The Baker Incident Report „ÉªSurvival Resources Pack „ÉªMr. Raccoon Weapon Charm In-App Purchases „ÉªWinters' Expansion Experience brand-new additional content for the award-winning modern horror masterpiece Resident Evil Village: Third Person Mode, The Mercenaries Additional Orders, and Shadows of Rose. „ÉªStreet Wolf Outfit - Street Wolf Outfit for Rose (applies to Shadow of Rose content only) „ÉªExtra Content Shop All Access Voucher Purchase Precautions - After purchase, returns (including exchange for other products/services) will not be provided for any reason. - In-app purchases can only be used by the Apple ID that made the purchase and cannot be shared with Family Sharing members. Compatible OSs and Devices https://www.residentevil.com/village/us/mac/

Application Screenshot

entry.title: Resident Evil Village
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Base GameÔºö$39.99 ‚Üí $15.99
  • All Access VoucherÔºö$4.99 ‚Üí $1.99
  • DLC packÔºö$19.99 ‚Üí $9.99

Application Description

Experience survival horror like never before in the 8th major installment in the Resident Evil franchise - Resident Evil Village. With detailed graphics, intense first-person action and masterful storytelling, the terror has never felt more realistic. ‚ñ†A network connection is required when starting the application. ------------------------------------------------------------ ‚ñ†About the End User License Agreement „ÉªThis End User License Agreement (this ‚ÄúAgreement‚Äù) applies to the user‚Äôs use of this game software program (the ‚ÄúProgram‚Äù). „ÉªTHIS AGREEMENT SHALL COME INTO EFFECT BETWEEN CAPCOM CO., LTD. AND USER(S) UPON INSTALLATION OF THE PROGRAM BY THE USER. „ÉªThose users between the ages of 13 and 18 (or between 13 and the age of legal majority in your country of residence) or a person with limited capacity shall install the Program only after obtaining approval from its parent or legal guardian who agrees to be bound by these provisions of this Agreement. Please confirm the terms above and agree to this Agreement before purchasing the Program. ------------------------------------------------------------ ‚ñ†Keyboard and mouse are not supported. ‚ñ†We recommend playing this game with a controller. It can be played on an iPad, but using a controller will provide a better experience. Note: Please check the Apple website for controllers compatible with iPad. Not all controllers will work as intended. ‚ñ†A limited part of the base game can be played for free. In order to play the full game, an in-app purchase is required. ‚ñ†This application is approximately 16GB. Important Note: The installation process requires that you have at least twice the size of the application in free storage space available. We recommend downloading the data in an environment with good connectivity. Estimated download time based on connection speed: 10Mbps - Over 3 hours 100Mbps - 30 to 40 minutes 300Mbps - 8 to 10 minutes ‚ñ†Save data upload and download functionality via iCloud Drive has been added. ‚ñ†Save data cannot be uploaded and downloaded between MacOS and iOS devices. ‚ñ†Resident Evil Village does not support Universal Purchase. [Warning] Signing out of Apple ID may cause problems with your save data. Please try to refrain from signing out as much as possible until this issue is resolved. In-App Purchases „ÉªResident Evil Village (Base Game)„ÄÄPurchasing this product allows you to play the entire base game. „ÄÄ„ÄÄ„ÄÄThe Trauma Pack DLC - Samurai Edge - AW Model-01 - Resident Evil 7 Found Footage Filter - Resident Evil 7 Tape Recorder Save Point - Saferoom Music "Go Tell Aunt Rhody" - Mr. Everywhere Weapon Charm - Unlock "Village of Shadows" Difficulty - The Tragedy of Ethan Winters Artwork - The Baker Incident Report „ÄÄ„ÄÄ„ÄÄSurvival Resources Pack „ÄÄ„ÄÄ„ÄÄMr. Raccoon Weapon Charm „ÉªWinters' Expansion Experience brand-new additional content for the award-winning modern horror masterpiece Resident Evil Village: Third Person Mode, The Mercenaries Additional Orders, and Shadows of Rose. „ÉªStreet Wolf Outfit - Street Wolf Outfit for Rose (applies to Shadow of Rose content only) „ÉªExtra Content Shop All Access Voucher Purchase Precautions - After purchase, returns (including exchange for other products/services) will not be provided for any reason. - In-app purchases can only be used by the Apple ID that made the purchase and cannot be shared with Family Sharing members. Compatible OSs and Devices https://www.capcom-games.com/apple/en-us/
